verses.name: Psalms 69:10
verses.text: When I wept, and chastened my soul with fasting, that was to my reproach.

verses.name: Psalms 69:11
verses.text: I made sackcloth also my garment; and I became a proverb to them.

verses.name: Psalms 69:12
verses.text: They that sit in the gate speak against me; and I was the song of the drunkards.

verses.name: Psalms 69:13
verses.text: But as for me, my prayer is unto thee, O Lord, in an acceptable time: O God, in the multitude of thy mercy hear me, in the truth of thy salvation.
